description:
Welcome Ava Devine to Ultimate Surrender. Ava, who's 5'4'' and 138 lbs., takes on the tiny 110-pound Amber Rayne. Will size and huge breasts be enough to take down the little veteran?
Amber schools our new MILF in the ways of Ultimate Surrender, but for a newcomer Ava shows great promise and a desire to return and improve. But today was not Ava's day; it belonged to the veteran. At one point during the match, the Rogue was fingering Ava's ass for maximum points. Add to that a brutal ass fucking with our biggest strap-on in RD4 and you can say Ava was properly introduced to Ultimate Surrender.
title: Amber Rayne "Rogue" (1-2) vs Ava Devine "The Barracuda" (0-0)
